title: macOS-Inspired Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website inspired by macOS UI, featuring draggable windows, dock-style navigation, and an interactive desktop experience built using React.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: A fun and interactive web application built with React that allows users to play the classic Rock, Paper, Scissors game against the computer with an engaging and responsive UI.

title: ToDo Application
description: A responsive task management application that allows users to create, update, delete, and mark tasks as completed, with local storage integration for data persistence.

title: UrbanClap Clone
description: An on-demand service marketplace clone that connects users with local professionals for services such as home cleaning, plumbing, electrical repairs, and beauty services.
